original_text: David and Abishai then went across the valley to the other side of the hill. David stood on the top of the hill. He was far away from Saul's soldiers.
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 건너편으로 가서 멀리 산 꼭대기에 서니 거리가 멀더라

sentences.original_text: David and Abishai then went across the valley
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 아비새가 그때 골짜기 건너편으로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to the other side of the hill
David stood on the top of the hill
He was far away from Saul's soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사울의 병사들에서 멀리 떨어져 있었습니다
